articles.description: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Sensex gained 1245.05 points, or 1.72, to settle at 72500.3, while the Nifty gained 355.95 points, or 1.62, to close at 21982.8.
articles.content: The Nifty closed at 21982.8, up by 1.62% today. Throughout the day, the Nifty reached a high of 22353.3 and a low of 22047.75. On the other hand, the Sensex traded between 73819.21 and 72591.14, clos… [+3999 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk Sues OpenAI, CEO Sam Altman Over Alleged Breach Of Contract - NDTV
articles.description: Elon Musk has sued OpenAI and its chief executive Sam Altman, among others, accusing them of breaching contractual agreements made when he helped found the ChatGPT-maker in 2015, according to a lawsuit filed on Thursday in San Francisco.
articles.content:
Elon Musk co-founded OpenAI in 2015, but stepped down from the company's board in 2018. (File)
